about_the_game:
Evil Below is a first-person horror adventure game that combines horror elements with unique puzzle solving and stealth.

The game centers around a mother searching for her son in a semi-openworld landscape filled with never-ending forests, abandoned villages and claustrophobic caverns.
In this world, several creatures made these lands their territory, and you are their prey.

Features

  • Explore a vast mysterious world where every step, every choice and every breath could be leathal.
  • Solve unique puzzles.
  • Manage your inventory and choose which path to take.
  • Use weapons to your advantage.
  • Be stealthy to evade threats.
  • Your voice can be a gift but also a curse.

short_description: You wake up. Your head hurts, your vision is distorted and you are alone in a never ending forest surrounded by fog and whispers calling your name from Below. It will not let you leave and the only way is down.
